snippet.title: Despair: Blood Curse - Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. After the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place. Will she save her sister before it's too late?

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629350
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10005861

Website: https://crimsonsequence.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrimsonSequence
Facebook: https://facebook.com/CrimsonSequence
Instagram: https://instagram.com/crimsonsequence
